title: Introduction to Conservation Genetics
abstract:
Extracted from text ... Introduction to Conservation Genetics by 
R. Frankham, J.D. Ballou & D.A. Briscoe Cambridge 
University Press, Cambridge. 2002. 
Pp. 617. Price R395 (paperback). ISBN 0 521 
63985 9. 
This book represents, to my knowledge, the first 
(and long overdue) textbook focussing entirely on 
conservation genetics and the authors should be 
commended for doing a great job in putting it 
together. As stated in the preface of the book, it is 
directed towards students encountering conservation 
genetics for the first time. However, the 
level that certain principles are dealt with in the 
book definitely requires some prior understanding ..
